title: Initial Complaint
description: Palm Beach Police investigate after a 14-year-old girl's family reports molestation at Epstein's mansion.

title: Prosecutorial Handover
description: State Attorney Barry Krischer refers the case to a grand jury rather than filing direct charges.

title: Grand Jury Indictment
description: Florida grand jury indicts Epstein on a single count of soliciting prostitution.

title: Operation Leap Year
description: FBI opens federal investigation 'Operation Leap Year' spanning FL, NY, and USVI.

title: Multi-State Interviews
description: FBI begins interviewing 60+ potential victims and witnesses across New Mexico and New York.

title: Non-Prosecution Agreement
description: Secret plea deal signed by Alexander Acosta granting federal immunity for the USVI and Florida.

title: Sentencing
description: Epstein sentenced to 18 months with daily work-release privileges.

title: Work Release Initiation
description: Epstein begins leaving jail daily to work at his private Palm Beach office.

title: Giuffre Lawsuit
description: Virginia Roberts Giuffre files suit against Epstein and Maxwell alleging international trafficking.

title: Release from Custody
description: Epstein released after 13 months, remains a registered Level 3 sex offender.

title: Registration Failure
description: NYC Police reveal Epstein has systematically failed to check in as required by state law.

title: Perversion of Justice
description: Miami Herald 'Perversion of Justice' investigation renews global scrutiny on the 2008 deal.

title: CVRA Violation Ruling
description: Federal judge rules the 2008 NPA violated the Crime Victims' Rights Act.

title: Teterboro Arrest
description: FBI captures Epstein at Teterboro Airport upon return from Paris on a private jet.

title: Manhattan Search
description: Search of 9 East 71st St recovers a safe with diamonds, fake passports, and thousands of photos.

title: Acosta Resignation
description: Alexander Acosta resigns as Labor Secretary following backlash over the 2008 deal.

title: Bail Denial
description: Judge Richard Berman denies bail, citing Epstein as a danger to the community.

title: First Incident
description: Epstein found with neck injuries at MCC NYC; placed on suicide watch.

title: Watch Removal
description: Suicide watch terminated after 31 hours; Epstein moved to high-security unit.

title: Death at MCC
description: Jeffrey Epstein found dead in cell 38. Guards later charged with falsifying logs.

title: Charges Vacated
description: Judge Berman dismisses federal charges against Epstein due to his death.

title: Maxwell Arrest
description: FBI high-risk operation in New Hampshire leads to the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.

title: Maxwell Verdict
description: Jury finds Maxwell guilty of 5 counts of trafficking and conspiracy.

title: Maxwell Sentencing
description: Maxwell sentenced to 20 years in federal prison; currently serving at FCI Tallahassee.

title: Massive Document Unsealing
description: Judge Preska releases 2,000+ pages of records naming 170+ associates and 'Doe' entities.

title: Political Pledge
description: Pledge made to release all remaining classified files related to the network.

title: Forensic Video Audit
description: Independent analysis of MCC hallway footage reveals critical frame-drops and edits.

title: Total Transparency Initiative
description: DOJ final release including 18,550 files, 887 videos and 6,775 property stills.
